post.author: obihb
post.body:
I've decided to start this thread since I've already posted the first shot of the Q3A shotgun in the works. I basically just wanted to make the Q3A weapons for the Doom engine but what I've decided in stead is to make them for Quake4.

I'll post the progress off the weapons here as I get work done on them. This is really just a side project for the pure fun of it. It's something I work on now and then just to get into something different from my usual stuff.

Here's some wip shots of the shotgun and the rocket launcher..







For the rocket launcher I've been doing some initial tests in the engine to see how the normal map works and so on. None of these are final shots.

What I'm trying to do with these weapons is basically get the original feel of the weapon but add some stuff here and there to make it feel more like it fits into this new engine.

I'm still not sure if I'll make all of them but I wanted to make the shotgun and rocket at the very least and probably the railgun. I've made another railgun previously but not a remake of Q3A so I'll make a new one for that. It's just such a cool gun to make..

post.author: obihb
post.body:
Thanks..

I can play more with bumpyness an spec for sure. Definately need to work more on diffuse aswell.

I model everything using 3DS Max.

The renders for the shotgun are done with Mental Ray and I apply a "Ambient/Reflective Occlusion" material as the diffuse map to get the effect of global light plus normal blinn shading. The big shot with shadow casting on the ground was rendered with Brazil, skylight plus area light.

The rocket is rendered with Brazil using the skylight plus area light.
